*Note:* For compatibility with Python 2.6 and Python 3.0, since version 1.9.9.5, PyScripter requires the [http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=A5C84275-3B97-4AB7-A40D-3802B2AF5FC2&displaylang=en latest C++ Redistributable Package]. This is automatically installed by Python 2.6 and Python 3.x. If you do not have any of these versions installed, then you need to download and install it manually. Also if you are using a 64bit version of Windows note that PyScripter will only work if a 32bit version of Python is installed.
